title: Create a Vue Component
description: Create a Vue Component for Nx.

examples.description: Generate a component `one` in the `my-app` application at my-app/src/app/one

path.description: The file path to the component without the file extension (e.g. `my-app/src/app/my-component/my-component` generates the file `my-app/src/app/my-component/my-component.vue`). Relative to the current working directory.
path.x-prompt: What is the component file path?

name.description: The component symbol name. It not provided, it defaults to the last segment of the provided `path`.

js.description: Generate JavaScript files rather than TypeScript files.

skipTests.description: When true, does not create `spec.ts` test files for the new component.

export.description: When true, the component is exported from the project `index.ts` (if it exists).
export.x-prompt: Should this component be exported in the project?

fileName.description: Create a component with this file name.

inSourceTests.description: When using Vitest, separate spec files will not be generated and instead will be included within the source files. Read more on the Vitest docs site: https://vitest.dev/guide/in-source.html
